name: Três Barras on paper
description:
This is the Três Barras arrangement's score.

Seven other musicians and I spent weeks studying this score until we were able to record it.

This is about musical process!

Três Barras it's a wonderful waterfall in Chapada Diamantina - Bahia - Brazil.

After spending 20 days immersed in this place with some of my best friends, I just sat at the piano and composed this song.

Composition by Davi Fonseca
Lyrics by Lucas Filipe Oliveira
Arrangement by Rafael Martini

Davi Fonseca (Piano and Voice)
Mônica Salmaso (voice)
Rafael Martini (accordion)
Alexandre Andrés (c flute)
Alexandre Silva (clarinet)
Camila Rocha (acustic bass)
Natália Mitre (Berimbau)
Yuri Vellasco (drums)
